issues.title: Climate Change and Environmental Protection
issues.description: Strong advocate for combating climate change, supports Green New Deal framework, pushes for renewable energy investments and reducing carbon emissions

issues.title: Healthcare Reform
issues.description: Supports expanding the Affordable Care Act, advocates for lowering prescription drug prices, and believes in protecting pre-existing condition coverage

issues.title: Education Funding
issues.description: Supports increased federal education funding, student debt relief, and expanding access to community colleges and vocational training

issues.title: Immigration Reform
issues.description: Supports comprehensive immigration reform with path to citizenship, opposes border wall, advocates for DACA protections

issues.title: Economic Development
issues.description: Supports increasing minimum wage, protecting workers' rights, promoting small business growth, and infrastructure investment

issues.title: Gun Safety
issues.description: Advocates for universal background checks, assault weapons ban, and other gun control measures to reduce gun violence

issues.title: Reproductive Rights
issues.description: Strong supporter of abortion rights, opposes restrictions on reproductive healthcare, supports Planned Parenthood funding
